vote.title: To Welcome and Celebrate the Cast and Crew of the Critically Acclaimed Musical & Juliet to Columbus
vote.description:
Title
 
To Welcome and Celebrate the Cast and Crew of the Critically Acclaimed Musical & Juliet to Columbus
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, & Juliet is a groundbreaking jukebox musical that reimagines William Shakespeare’s Romeo & Juliet, exploring an alternative narrative where Juliet chooses her own fate, set to a soundtrack of chart-topping pop hits; and
 
WHEREAS, since its debut, & Juliet has garnered widespread critical acclaim and commercial success, with productions in numerous countries, captivating audiences with its innovative storytelling and infectious music; and
WHEREAS, the musical has received multiple prestigious nominations and awards, including Tony, Oliver, and Grammy nominations, solidifying its status as a cultural phenomenon that resonates with diverse audiences; and 
WHEREAS, the cast and crew of & Juliet are composed of highly skilled professionals, including award-winning actors, musicians, designers, and creatives who bring the vibrant production to life with extraordinary talent and dedication; and 
WHEREAS, the production has been praised for its dazzling performances, high-energy choreography, and inclusive storytelling, earning standing ovations and critical recognition for its excellence in theatrical artistry; and
WHEREAS, the City of Columbus recognizes the immense cultural value that touring productions bring to communities and is honored to welcome the cast and crew of & Juliet, reaffirming our commitment to supporting the art and the enriching experiences they provide to residents; now, therefore,
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council hereby welcomes and celebrates the cast and crew of the critically acclaimed musical & Juliet to Columbus.
